attributes.action: Allow our Gymnastic athletes to continue training during lockdown.
attributes.additional_details:
The mental health of this countries athletes is imperative. They are the future of the country and you need to stand behind them and show them the importance of what they do. 

Please give special consideration to Covid Secure training to continue
attributes.background: Our gymnasts are losing strength. They cannot Train the same in video calls. Gym time is invaluable for their strength and skills. They are already uncertain weather they will be able to compete but they are working so hard to ensure they are prepared.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Keep gyms and leisure facilities open during any lockdown: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/556956

Prevent gyms closing due to a spike in Covid 19 cases: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/333869

The Committee will be holding a debate on Covid-19 restrictions on gyms and sport on Monday 23 November. You will be able to watch the debate on Parliament TV at 4.30pm: https://www.parliamentlive.tv/Commons

The Government has exempted gyms and sporting facilities from the requirement to close for elite sports persons to train and compete: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/new-national-restrictions-from-5-november
